chapter.title: Change Profile
chapter.para: Opics Portal allows you to view and update your profile from the System Features menu. No particular jurisdiction is required to use this feature.

section.title: Accessing System Features
section.para:
From the toolbar, click
and then click Change Profile to open the Change User Profile screen. This screen allows you to view and update the language and the password of your profile.

section.title: Functions
section.para: The Change User Profile screen displays a form containing:

listitem.para: Displays the company name, login Id, and the full name of the user.
Allows you to select the language to be used in portal pages. It also defines the date and number format.
Allows you to manage your password to access the portal home page.

section.para: The form contains the following fields:

entry.para: Displays your company name. This is part of user identification in Misys Portal.
Displays the login Id to access the portal home page
Displays the full name of the user. It can contain up to 35 characters.
Specifies the language to be used in the portal pages. It also defines the date and number format. You can select French or English (UK) from the drop-down list.
Select this check-box to enable the remaining fields.
Specify the existing password in this field
Provide a new password in this field
Re-enter the new password specified above.

section.para: To store the changes, click on Save at the bottom of the form. Else, click on Cancel to discard the modifications made above. In the confirmation message box click on OK to go back to the System Features screen without applying the changes.
Note: When the password is changed, the password expiry date is computed and stored, and the invalid login attempts counter is reset.
Depending on the system parameters, the new password may be validated with previously used passwords, and may be rejected. This prevents you from simply re-using the same password.
